creator: MeWe
descriptionHtml:
MeWe is the uplifting next-gen social network with awesome social features and No BS. No Ads, No Targeting, No Newsfeed manipulation.

MeWe has exciting, easy-to-use features for authentic connecting with friends, family, and common interest groups, including: dedicated newsfeeds for close friends versus all contacts; private and open groups; fan and business pages; great chat features for both 1:1 and group chats; disappearing content; fun custom camera with cool tricks and GIF creation; live voice and live video for around the world connections; next-gen voice messaging; personal social cloud; custom member profiles for every group; and more.

MeWe members enjoy total control over what they share along with full ownership of their content and data. The next-gen social networking platform has no facial recognition, and no newsfeed or content manipulation common on other social media platforms. MeWe members see every post, chat, comment, etc., made by individuals, pages and groups they are connected with, in true timeline order.

MeWe members own their data and enjoy the protection of MeWe’s Privacy Bill Of Rights. MeWe is advised by Sir Tim Berners-Lee, the inventor of the Web, and MeWe's CEO, Mark Weinstein, is a world renowned privacy advocate.

MeWe is the social network for everyone who wants to have fun, communicate authentically and share like-minded & disparate ideas under the umbrella of trust, control, and safety. Let's MeWe!"

Premium EmojiOne.com sticker packs are available in the MeWe Store. Copyright JoyPixels Inc. 2019.
descriptionShort: Share photos and messages privately and easily with your groups and friends.

Organize your favorite stories and keep them visible on your profile. Choose who can view your Journals by adjusting your privacy settings. You can quickly find stories by the date they were created.

Archive

MeWe
c/o Morrison and Foerster LLP
425 Market Street
San Francisco, CA 94105

creator: MeWe
descriptionHtml:
MeWe is the uplifting next-gen social network with awesome social features and No BS. No Ads, No Targeting, No Newsfeed manipulation.

MeWe has exciting, easy-to-use features for authentic connecting with friends, family, and common interest groups, including: dedicated newsfeeds for close friends versus all contacts; private and open groups; fan and business pages; great chat features for both 1:1 and group chats; disappearing content; fun custom camera with cool tricks and GIF creation; live voice and live video for around the world connections; next-gen voice messaging; personal social cloud; custom member profiles for every group; and more.

MeWe members enjoy total control over what they share along with full ownership of their content and data. The next-gen social networking platform has no facial recognition, and no newsfeed or content manipulation common on other social media platforms. MeWe members see every post, chat, comment, etc., made by individuals, pages and groups they are connected with, in true timeline order.

MeWe members own their data and enjoy the protection of MeWe’s Privacy Bill Of Rights. MeWe is advised by Sir Tim Berners-Lee, the inventor of the Web, and MeWe's CEO, Mark Weinstein, is a world renowned privacy advocate.

MeWe is the social network for everyone who wants to have fun, communicate authentically and share like-minded & disparate ideas under the umbrella of trust, control, and safety. Let's MeWe!"

Premium EmojiOne.com sticker packs are available in the MeWe Store. Copyright JoyPixels Inc. 2019.
descriptionShort: Share photos and messages privately and easily with your groups and friends.

355 South Grand Avenue, Suite 100

creator: MeWe
descriptionHtml:
MeWe is the uplifting next-gen social network with awesome social features and No BS. No Ads, No Targeting, No Newsfeed manipulation.

MeWe has exciting, easy-to-use features for authentic connecting with friends, family, and common interest groups, including: dedicated newsfeeds for close friends versus all contacts; private and open groups; fan and business pages; great chat features for both 1:1 and group chats; disappearing content; fun custom camera with cool tricks and GIF creation; live voice and live video for around the world connections; next-gen voice messaging; personal social cloud; custom member profiles for every group; and more.

MeWe members enjoy total control over what they share along with full ownership of their content and data. The next-gen social networking platform has no facial recognition, and no newsfeed or content manipulation common on other social media platforms. MeWe members see every post, chat, comment, etc., made by individuals, pages and groups they are connected with, in true timeline order.

MeWe members own their data and enjoy the protection of MeWe’s Privacy Bill Of Rights. MeWe is advised by Sir Tim Berners-Lee, the inventor of the Web, and MeWe's CEO, Mark Weinstein, is a world renowned privacy advocate.

MeWe is the social network for everyone who wants to have fun, communicate authentically and share like-minded & disparate ideas under the umbrella of trust, control, and safety. Let's MeWe!"

creator: MeWe
descriptionHtml:
MeWe is the uplifting next-gen social network with awesome social features and No BS. No Ads, No Targeting, No Newsfeed manipulation.

MeWe has exciting, easy-to-use features for authentic connecting with friends, family, and common interest groups, including: dedicated newsfeeds for close friends versus all contacts; private and open groups; fan and business pages; great chat features for both 1:1 and group chats; disappearing content; fun custom camera with cool tricks and GIF creation; live voice and live video for around the world connections; next-gen voice messaging; personal social cloud; custom member profiles for every group; and more.

MeWe members enjoy total control over what they share along with full ownership of their content and data. The next-gen social networking platform has no facial recognition, and no newsfeed or content manipulation common on other social media platforms. MeWe members see every post, chat, comment, etc., made by individuals, pages and groups they are connected with, in true timeline order.

MeWe members own their data and enjoy the protection of MeWe’s Privacy Bill Of Rights. MeWe is advised by Sir Tim Berners-Lee, the inventor of the Web, and MeWe's CEO, Mark Weinstein, is a world renowned privacy advocate.

MeWe is the social network for everyone who wants to have fun, communicate authentically and share like-minded & disparate ideas under the umbrella of trust, control, and safety. Let's MeWe!"

Premium EmojiOne.com sticker packs are available in the MeWe Store. Copyright JoyPixels Inc. 2019.

title: MeWe

container.value:
MeWe
c/o Latham & Watkins
355 South Grand Avenue, Suite 100
Los Angeles, California 90071-1560

creator: MeWe
descriptionHtml:
MeWe is the uplifting next-gen social network with awesome social features and No BS. No Ads, No Targeting, No Newsfeed manipulation.

MeWe has exciting, easy-to-use features for authentic connecting with friends, family, and common interest groups, including: dedicated newsfeeds for close friends versus all contacts; private and open groups; fan and business pages; great chat features for both 1:1 and group chats; disappearing content; fun custom camera with cool tricks and GIF creation; live voice and live video for around the world connections; next-gen voice messaging; personal social cloud; custom member profiles for every group; and more.

MeWe members enjoy total control over what they share along with full ownership of their content and data. The next-gen social networking platform has no facial recognition, and no newsfeed or content manipulation common on other social media platforms. MeWe members see every post, chat, comment, etc., made by individuals, pages and groups they are connected with, in true timeline order.

MeWe members own their data and enjoy the protection of MeWe’s Privacy Bill Of Rights. MeWe is advised by Sir Tim Berners-Lee, the inventor of the Web, and MeWe's CEO, Mark Weinstein, is a world renowned privacy advocate.

MeWe is the social network for everyone who wants to have fun, communicate authentically and share like-minded & disparate ideas under the umbrella of trust, control, and safety. Let's MeWe!"

Premium EmojiOne.com sticker packs are available in the MeWe Store. Copyright JoyPixels Inc. 2019.

creator: MeWe
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to MeWe, the ultimate social media platform designed to bring people closer in a fun, safe and engaging way.

MeWe is one of the world's largest decentralized social media networks. With a privacy focus, it contains no ads, no targeting and no newsfeed manipulation. We are a community focused experience with more than 700,000 interest groups, allowing anyone to find like-minded people that share their same passions – no matter how obscure.

* Groups - Join or create your own groups to share ideas, hobbies or just have fun with like-minded people. From small and private family groups to large public communities, there's a space for everyone.

* Social Network - Build your own social network by connecting with followers who share your interests. Share updates and post content to your profile or to your groups and grow your community.

* A decentralized identity and a universal handle - Join our decentralized social media platform with blockchain-level security to get exclusive access to the entire web3 ecosystem.

* Safety & Privacy - Your safety is our priority. Enjoy a secure environment where your data is protected, instead of being sold to advertisers, making it a perfect social platform for both individuals and families interested in safety and privacy.

* No algorithms in the newsfeed - We are not using any algorithms to boost content, enjoy the only social media platform that doesn't manipulate.

* Memes & Fun - Explore trending memes, share laughs with friends and followers, and keep the fun going every day.

* Audio & Video Calls (Premium) - Communicate seamlessly with high-quality audio and video calls. Stay close to loved ones no matter where they are.

* Chat & Group Chat - Engage in real-time conversations through our secure chat. Share text, images, videos and memes with ease individually or with your groups.

* Followers & Community Growth - Gain new followers, expand your own social network, and build lasting relationships in a vibrant online world.

* Cloud Storage - Enjoy dedicated cloud storage where you can store all important media files in a secure way.

* Scheduled Posts - No time to post now? We get your back! Schedule posts ahead to optimize your content visibility for your followers and groups.

MeWe is member-supported social media platform. Thanks to our subscribers we can provide a safe social network for all. If you choose to support us by subscribing to Premium, here is what that unlocks:
* 60 second video stories
* 100GB of cloud storage
* Unlimited voice + video calling
* And much more real social media experience...

Privacy policy: MeWe.com/privacy
Terms of use: MeWe.com/terms

Note: If you subscribe via Android, payment will be charged to your Google Play Store account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless the user has unsubscribed at least 24 hours before the next billing cycle. Subscriptions and auto-renewal can be managed by going into your Google Play Account Settings after purchase.
